name: swamphacks-system
description: collection of software used in running swamphacks

scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd dashboard/ && npm i" "cd functions/functions/ && npm i" "cd internal/ && npm i"
scripts.setup-config: concurrently "cp config.js dashboard/src/config/" "cp config.js internal/src/config/" "cp config.js functions/functions/config/"
scripts.dashboard-dev: concurrently "cd dashboard/ && npm start" "cd functions/functions/ && npm run serve"

author: SwampHacks
